name: The Gun is Good (PROTOTYPE)
description:
Aspiring roguelite twinstick shooter. Early prototype with barely any content implemented; beware of many placeholders, lacking sound, and bugs. All feedback is appreciated.

Keys:

Movement: WASD

Dash: Left shift

Aim: Mouse

Pickup: F

Reload: R

Change gun: 1,2,3,4 and scrollwheel up/down

Fire: Left mouse button

Secondary (currently only for shield gun): Right mouse button

Debug cheat keys:

F2: Invulnerability

F11: Spawn enemies
